author: Climate Town
description:
GODZILLA. Check out Ground News! https://ground.news/climatetown/ 
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ClimateTown 
sUbScRiBe FoR mOrE ViDeOs: https://www.youtube.com/c/climatetown?sub_confirmation=1 

GOOD NEWS we like making these videos but we have no way of telling if they actually do any good in the world. So we created a completely original survey where you can go and tell us about any changes you’ve made after watching a Climate Town video. Maybe you compost now? Or maybe you got a bike? Or maybe you even went back to school? Whatever it is, we’d love to hear about it: https://forms.gle/TKdkTfu1jZWBRf4P8

Want to support us and also get access to behind the scenes videos, discounted live show tickets, and a secret phone line you can call and talk to Rollie? Well then you’ll be shocked to find that’s exactly what our Patreon offers: https://www.patreon.com/ClimateTown

Wanna see Climate Town but live and in person? Well you’re in luck because we’re going back to San Francisco Sketc
title: Exxon’s $600 Million Dollar Lie
